list_definition.definition: the part of a garment that covers the arm

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He tore the sleeve of his jacket

list_definition.definition: (also record-sleeve) a stiff envelope for a gramophone record.
something, eg a tubular part in a piece of machinery, that covers as a sleeve of a garment does the arm.
